creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: five rectangular forms grouped together; two on each end, one in the center
image_copyright: © Joel Shapiro %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
text: With just five rectangular blocks, this work brilliantly references the human form. The “stick” figure reclines peacefully, resting its heavy limbs. At a glance, it’s easy to imagine the ease and relief of such a pose.
title: Untitled
